dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: Daddy, I want to discuss the prom with you. It's tomorrow night --

dialogue.speaker: WALTER
dialogue.text: The prom?  Kat has a date?

dialogue.speaker: WALTER
dialogue.text: It's that hot rod Joey, right? That ' s who you want me to bend my rules for?

dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: He's not a "hot rod".  Whatever that is.

dialogue.speaker: WALTER
dialogue.text: You're not going unless your sister goes.  End of story.

dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: Fine.  I see that I'm a prisoner in my own house.  I'm not a daughter. I'm a possession!
